plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Shorts or Pants to use your location to collect local weather data.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow Shorts or Pants to use your location to collect local weather data.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Shorts or Pants to use your location to collect local weather data.

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: App requires geolocation to collect the weather from your current position.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: App requires geolocation to collect the weather from your current position.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: App requires geolocation to collect the weather from your current position.
